TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ImageIndexConverter extends System.ComponentModel.Int32Converter

summary.span: 提供型別轉換子 (Type Converter)，將影像索引的資料與字串間相互轉換。

span.span: Provides a type converter to convert data for an image index to and from a string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別用來將索引值的轉換與其他資料型別，通常。The class is used to convert index values of an to and from other data types, typically . 如需型別轉換子的詳細資訊，請參閱基底類別和[如何： 實作型別轉換子](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56)。For more information about type converters, see the base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56). > [!NOTE] > 一般而言，您無法直接建立的執行個體。Typically, you do not directly create an instance of an . 請改為呼叫方法的。Instead, call the method of . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的範例基底類別。For more information, see the examples in the base class.

summary.span: 將指定的值物件轉換為 32 位元帶正負號的整數物件。

span.span: Converts the specified value object to a 32-bit signed integer object.
An that represents the converted .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個型別轉換子只可以將轉換的 32 位元帶正負號的整數物件與字串。This type converter only can convert a 32-bit signed integer object to and from a string. `context`可用來擷取這個型別轉換子會從叫用的環境的其他資訊。The `context` can be used to extract additional information about the environment this type converter is being invoked from. 這可能是 `null`，所以您要隨時檢查。This may be `null`, so you should always check. 此外，內容物件上的屬性也可能會傳回 `null`。Also, properties on the context object may also return `null`.

span.span: The conversion could not be performed.

summary.span: 針對與指定格式內容相關聯的影像清單，傳回標準索引值的集合。

span.span: Returns a collection of standard index values for the image list associated with the specified format context.
A that holds a standard set of valid index values.

returns.span: 如果找不到任何影像清單，這個集合會包含單一物件，其值為 -1。

span.span: If no image list is found, this collection will contain a single object with a value of -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回的相關聯的影像清單索引值的集合屬性`context`參數。Returns a collection of index values for image lists associated with the property of the `context` parameter. 如果找不到，則會搜尋這類清單元件的父代。If an is not found, then the parent of the component will be searched for such a list. 通常方法會嘗試使用之前呼叫來和方法。Typically the method is called to before an attempt is made to use the and methods.

summary.span: 判斷從 方法所傳回的標準值清單是否為獨佔清單。

span.span: Determines if the list of standard values returned from the method is an exclusive list.

returns.span: 如果 方法傳回有效值的獨佔清單，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the method returns an exclusive list of valid values; otherwise, .
This implementation always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果所傳回的清單方法是獨佔的則沒有其他的值為有效。If the list returned by the method is exclusive, then no other values are valid. 這是典型的列舉的資料型別。This is typical of an enumerated data type. 如果清單不是獨佔的則有其他有效值的標準清單值 besides提供。If the list is not exclusive, then there are other valid values besides the list of standard values that provides. 在此型別轉換子中實作時，此方法一律傳回`false`。As implemented in this type converter, this method always returns `false`. 通常方法會嘗試使用之前呼叫來和方法。Typically the method is called to before an attempt is made to use the and methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在這個類別中實作一律會傳回`true`因為這個物件可以從清單中選取的映像支援一組標準的索引值。As implemented in this class, always returns `true` since this object supports a standard set of index values for images that can be picked from a list.
